mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO user_favorite (user_id, video_no) VALUES (#{userId}, #{videoNo});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND video_no = #{videoNo};
mapper.select: SELECT v.* FROM user_favorite uf JOIN video v ON uf.video_no = v.video_no WHERE uf.user_id = #{userId}
